SELECT d.id, d.`name` houseName, d.address, FORMAT(d.warehousing, 2) warehousing, FORMAT(d.truckage, 2) truckage, d.remark, d.principal, d.is_default isDefault, CONVERT (d.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.delete_flag = 0
AND d.name LIKE '%${name}%'
ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
SELECT d.id, d.`name` houseName FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.name = #{name} AND d.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: INSERT into erp_depot( id, name, address, warehousing, truckage, remark, principal, is_default, create_time )VALUES( #{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{warehousing}, #{truckage}, #{remark}, #{principal}, #{isDefault}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.`name` houseName, d.address, d.warehousing, d.truckage, d.remark, d.principal, d.is_default isDefault, CONVERT (d.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.id = #{id} ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT d.id FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.id != #{id} AND d.name = #{name} AND d.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT d.id FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.id = #{id} AND d.is_default = 1 AND d.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM erp_depot a WHERE a.delete_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.is_default ASC

SELECT d.id, d.`name` houseName, d.address, FORMAT(d.warehousing, 2) warehousing, FORMAT(d.truckage, 2) truckage, d.remark, d.principal, d.is_default isDefault, CONVERT (d.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.id = #{id} ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT b.user_id id, b.user_name `name`, b.email FROM erp_depot a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.principal, ','),CONCAT(',', b.user_id, ','))
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM erp_depot a WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.principal, ','),CONCAT(',', #{currentUserId}, ','))
